div.bibl: El Mexicano, Vol. I, No. 1. April 20, 1934. Baptist Convention

body.p: One hundred and fifty delegates, representing the Mexican Baptist Church from the Middle-West, are attending the Convention. The convention is taking place in the Mexican Baptist Church at 4658 Gross Avenue from April 18 to 22, 1934. The program is as follows: April 18, 7:30 P.M. Devotional Service, conducted by Lucio P. Avila. At 7:45 special music by Century of Progress orchestra 8:00 P.M. Opening sermon by Rev. Ramon Tolsa. April 19, at 9:00 A.M. registration of delegates, Ministerial Conference presided by Rev. Frank Martinez and a theme in charge of Dr. R. C. Schell. 10:00 A. M. special music and singing. 10:10 A. M. Government of the Church by Dr. J. E. Davies. 10:40 A. M. Business meeting. 11:00 A. M. Pauline Ecclesiology by Dr. Carlos L. Detwieler. At 2:00 P. M. A program by the Feminine Association. 7:00 P. M. Service of Praise by Rev. Reinaldo Olivares. 7:15 P. M. Chorus by brothers from Indiana Harbor, Ind. 7:30 P. M. Introduction of visitors. 8:00 P. M. Mexico Today, by Senor Carlos Palacios Roji, Consul of Mexico.

April 20, at 9:00 A. M. Commendation Service, by brother Tomas Montemayor. 9:15 "Modern Enemies of the Church" by Rev. Pablo J. Villonueva. 10:00 Business of the Convention. 10:30 The Church and its own support by Dr. E. R. Brown. 11:00 Pauline Ecclesiology by Dr. Carlos L. Deitweiler. 2:00 P. M. Essay: "The Church and the Religious Education" by Rev. F. M. Santiago. 2:30 Music and songs. 2:40 The Cooperative work of the Church by Dr. A. E. Paterson. 3:10 Special Music. 3:20 The Church and the Gospel by Dr. J. E. Davies. 4:00 "Offering of the Church to the Youth" by Rev. Armando Alvarado. 7:30 Service of Praise by brother Benjamin Morales. 7:45 Music by the Orchestra. 8:00 The Church and its Missions by Mr. J. E. Davies. April 21, at 9:00 A. M. Service of Commendation by brother Porfirio Martinez. 9:15 The Church and the Kingdom of Heaven by Rev. Castulo de Lara. 9:30 Special Music by the Century of Progress Orchestra. 10:00 Business Meeting. 11:00 Pauline Ecclesiology by Dr. Carlos L. Detweiler. 2:00 P. M. Service of Praise by brother H. Boones. 2:15 Chorus by the South Chicago Church singers. 2:20 "Challenge of the Cross "Drama by the Baptist Mexican Youth of Chicago. 5:00 "The Church of the future" by Rev. Jose W. Martinez. 7:30 P. M. Service of Praise by brother Jesus de las Paz. Music by the orchestra "Century of Progress". 8:00 The word of the Holy-Ghost and the Church by Rev. Jose P. Ruiz.

April 22, 9:30 A. M. Bible School in charge of Rev. Frank Martinez. 11:00 Sermon by Rev. A. B. Apra. 2:00 P. M. Union Association of Baptist Youth. 7:30 Service of Praise by brother Manuel Martinez. 7:45 Music by the Orchestra. 8:00 P. M. Closing Sermon by Rev. Pablo Villannueva.
